H0.text: What make of car did Doc Brown turn into a time machine. Pontiac

H1.text: What make of car did Doc Brown turn into a time machine. Chevrolet

H2.text: What make of car did Doc Brown turn into a time machine. Ford

H3.text: What make of car did Doc Brown turn into a time machine. DeLorean

A4.text: The DMC DeLorean is most notably featured as the time machine in the Back to the Future film trilogy.
